name: D-Net™ 0950
shortDescription: VERY LOW TRAJECTORY IMPACT SPRINKLER FOR UNIFORM UNDER-CANOPY IRRIGATION
description: With its low water trajectory angle, D-Net™ 0950 is ideally suited for precise under canopy irrigation of banana or oil palm plantations up to 10 x 10 meters or field crops with windy conditions.

features.title: High water distribution uniformity & Higher yield
features.description: Innovative 3D diffusion arm, ensures relatively high water distribution uniformity, resulting uniform crop yields.

features.title: Efficient Water Usage
features.description: The lower trajectory angle of the water prevents evaporation to the air in areas with winds, and guarantees maximum water-use efficiency.
